quote.text: A strong woman is one who feels deeply and loves fiercely. Her tears flow just as abundantly as her laughter. She is both soft and powerful, practical and spiritual.
quote.author: Arian A.

scripture.text: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

message:
Hey Ms Sunshine ðŸŒ¸

Just wanted to remind you how much your peace matters to me. When you're calm, when you're happy, when you're smiling... the whole world feels lighter. Itâ€™s like the sky opens up and everything breathes better.

I hope today Was geat for you... No stress. No noise. Your peace is precious to me. Always rooting for it... always holding space for it.

I always got ya back.
